video.title: Twitch Plays(Viewers play/Chat plays)Final Fantasy on an actual Wii day 03 hour 12 to hour 24 type !help to learn how to play (Part 6)

commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 48 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

fragments.text: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 48 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: All of the code used on this stream is open source and can be found here: https://github.com/WhatAboutGaming/Twitch-Plays-Stuff

message.body: Not sure how to play? You can type !help or !commands in chat at any time to have a help message sent straight to chat.

message.body: We have a Discord server and there is currently a poll up for which game to be played after this (Date TBD), the options are: Final Fantasy 4 (Super NES, known as Final Fantasy 2 in North America, not to be confused with Final Fantasy 2 NES), Final Fantasy 6 (Super NES, known as Final Fantasy 3 in North America) and The Legend of Zelda (NES), you can vote for more than one option, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK
